createCampaign(address,string,string,str.details: emit:CrowdFundingCreated,after creating a new campaign successfully, emit an event for frontend interaction

donateToCampaign(uint256).details: revertCrowdFunding__TransferFailedReverts with CrowdFunding__TransferFailed if transfer fails

params._id: The campaign id must be less than current max id

getAllCampaigns().details: if data is small, or frontend wants all at once, try this and return all campaigns

returns._0: allCampaigns  all campaigns in the contract

getCampaign(uint256).details: structcampaignreturns a single campaign to reduce read pressure since it contains dynamic arrays

getCampaignsPaginated(uint256,uint256).details: returns limited number of campaigns to reduce read pressure since it contains dynamic arrays

createCampaign(address,string,string,str.notice: this function creates a new campaign

donateToCampaign(uint256).notice: this function allows donating to a specific campaign

getAllCampaigns().notice: returns all information of all campaigns

getCampaign(uint256).notice: returns all information of a single campaign

getCampaignsPaginated(uint256,uint256).notice: returns all information of multiple campaigns

getDonatorsAndDonations(uint256).notice: returns the donators and donation amounts for a single campaign

sIdOfCampaign().notice: id,idit records current id number, it's also the biggest id for nowIDthis ID is used for contract creation and auto-increments afterwards         (not associated with any campaign before creation)
